Hi again,

Thought I was done with my project, but here is another one...

=
I was using the the seed http://www.jku.at (domain of my university) to dev=
elop and test my focused crawler based on heritrix 2. With this seed crawli=
ng worked fine.

Now I tried to use other random seed domains (e.g. http://=
www.archive.org) and suddenly my crawl stalls right at the start?!?

If I u=
se the IP adresses instead of the domain names as seeds the crawl stops and=
 does not stall!?

I get "Failed to crawl seed, will retry" in the seed rep=
ort.

I tried it with the standard unchanged 2.0.2 distribution and the sta=
ndard profiles and got the same result?!?

Anyone got an explanation for th=
is strange behavior?

Im running on windows and from localhost:8080 from my=
 home (which is not part of the jku.at domain)

Thanks for any help

Georgi=
